name: Mari Ohara - Love Live!
description:
Thanks for all, i'm still learning about LoRA, hope you like it.

Weight is your choice, but i like (the best) 0.8

Tags you'll need: 1girl, solo, ohara mari, hair rings, blonde hair, yellow eyes, crown braid,

If you like my LoRAs, please support me on ko-fi

Follow me on pixiv

Yes! I finished all Aquors main girls.
